name: Gemini 2.0 Flash-Lite Preview
description: Latest preview version of Gemini 2.0 Flash-Lite. Most cost-efficient 2.0 model optimized for speed and scale with multimodal capabilities.
notes: Preview model - points to latest preview version. Available in Google AI Studio and Vertex AI. Better quality than 1.5 Flash at same speed and cost. Half the price of GPT-4o mini. May update with new improvements.
